content.html: “I commute two hours per day, just to sit on Teams meetings all day.” Hearing this a lot right now. There’s no way to bring 2019 back, how we work has been transformed. So there’s got to be a planned purpose for in-person work. Not just because it’s a Thursday.
content.value:
“I commute two hours per day, just to sit on Teams meetings all day.” 

Hearing this a lot right now. There’s no way to bring 2019 back, how we work has been transformed.

So there’s got to be a planned purpose for in-person work. Not just because it’s a Thursday.
